name: Astro Reach
description:
We are team 36. The team consists of Yorick ZF as project lead and audio editor, Tom C as programmer, Josh M as programmer, Tyler B as character artist, Steve Z as concept and environmental artist, Johnson D as supporting artist and Charlie K for outsourcing sound. 

 This is a game with the action verb REACHING. Sheridan College Game Design Game Jam Winter Semester 2023

Reach around an outer space sandbox by drilling into asteroids and interacting with objects.

WASD to move and numbers 1-5 to extend and retract arms.
